option_modal.description_line2: and naturally take it to the next step.
option_modal.hint: Same cost as direct chat, and if matched, chat opens for free!

insufficient_modal.title: Not enough gems
insufficient_modal.description:
With a purchase, you can send
1 letter ({{letterCost}}) and 1 like ({{likeCost}})
insufficient_modal.charge_sub_text: You can send your letter right after payment

validation.max_length: Letters can be up to 50 characters.
validation.contact_info: Contact info sharing is restricted. Please modify your text.

prompts.travel:
I noticed you love traveling.
What's your most memorable trip recently?
prompts.running:
Running as a hobby caught my attention.
Do you prefer running alone or with someone?
prompts.design:
I was excited to see you're a design major.
What project are you enjoying most these days?

success.subtitle_with_letter: If matched, chat starts for free!
success.subtitle_line2: you can start chatting right away!

error.insufficient_gems: Purchase gems now and start chatting with someone you like!
error.ticket_required: You need a rematch ticket. Buy one now and keep enjoying matches!
error.communication_restricted: Communication is currently restricted with this person. Please try again later.
error.duplicate_like: You've already sent a like to this person.
error.duplicate_request: Duplicate request or temporary issue occurred.
error.invalid_match: This match is no longer valid. Please try a new match.
error.match_not_found: Match not found. Please try a new match.
error.app_version_mismatch: App update required. Please update to the latest version.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
